item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 2, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

20. Hightouch (YC S19) Is Hiring Front End Engineers ( | hide)

27. Silicon Valley, Halt and Catch Fire, and How Microserfdom Ate the World (2015) (28 points | 3 comments)
